page.title: 11A TYPICAL SCHOOL-CHILDS DAY
page.content:
We have chosen to write about a typical sort of day of the 'average' class member in 4R.
{7 a.m.}Wake and get out of bed. {7.15 a.m.}Dress and have breakfast - often corn-flakes,toast and juice. {8 a.m.}Watch breakfast T.V. or read. {8.30 a.m.}Leave home and call for friends to walk to school with (or wait for friends to call). {8.50 a.m.}In the playground - play football/talk. {9.0 a.m.}Bell goes for start of school. {12.0}Lunch - packed lunch (sandwiches; crisps;biscuit;can of fizzy drink). Then out to play . {1.00 p.m.}School resumes. {3.15 p.m.}Home. Have a snack, then watch T.V. or play with friends. Evening meal and bed at{9.00 p.m.
